alert.note: Alert for Cotton; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 6:45PM CDT until September 08 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northern Wichita County in northern Texas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 645 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Hollister, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Burkburnett, Grandfield, Randlett, and Devol. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
